column4: hello, I am trying to setup my smtpd ... I have ESMTP Postfix ... but am getting this error 554 5.7.1 <wakko9warner@gmail.com>: Relay access denied <-- how do I setup relay access.
please help me so I can get my mail server up and running ....
(i like the name)  this is an old thread, but it could be helpful: http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-125081.html
